Message:
“So, it is thanks to you, Nina,
that the illusions were dispelled.”

“Wait... More importantly,
are you hurt?
Did anything frightening
happen to you...?”

Well actually,
I had loads of fun!
There were so many
fluffy white Masters who
came out to play with me...

“H-His Grace?
There were many of him...
that were fluffy white?”

But y’know, I really wanted
to play with everyone,
so I came back.
After all, my home is...

Huh? Ah! It’s Master!
Not a fluffy white Master...
And everyone else is here too!

I’m baaack!
I found my way
back home like a good kid!

But, I’m kinda pooped.
Master...gimme a piggyback ride~

I knew it.
Real Master is warmer and...

Master, wake me up when
we get back, ’kay? Also...hehe...

You’re the one I love the most
in the whole wide world, Master.
